subject: Re: [junit] setUp versus constructors
msgSnippet: ... I would prefer we speak the truth: Don t assume JUnit will use the same or different instances for each test. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger ::
messageBody:
Alexandru Popescu wrote:

> Hmmmm... I think than we should use the sintagm: "JUnit uses a
> different test instance for each test method" and not something like
> "JUnit will instantiate the test for each test method".

I would prefer we speak the truth: "Don't assume JUnit will use the same
or different instances for each test."
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
